title: Elementary Mathematics Educational Material Development and Customized Utilization Expert Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of mathematical concepts and general understanding of educational settings
context.additional_context: Program to enhance current teachers' ability to develop customized materials for students with diverse learning needs. Conducted via LMS-based learning in BYOD environments, with emphasis on creating and utilizing classroom-applicable resources

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more digital textbooks aligned with elementary mathematics curriculum standards
Learners develop at least two lesson materials tailored to class-specific characteristics using editable math resources in an LMS environment
Learners can create five or more individualized math activity sheets based on diagnostic assessment results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
